Chapter 4317 - Chapter 4317: 4316 Was Terrifying!

Chapter 4317: 4316 was terrifying!

Translator: 549690339

“What a terrifying attractive force.”

Wang Xian’s body was sucked into the sphere rapidly.

This caused his expression to change drastically.

After transforming into the body of the Divine Dragon, Wang Xian’s body was extremely huge.

However, even so, he was instantly pulled into the interior of the sphere.

What shocked Wang Xian was that this sphere actually wanted to completely devour and Fuse Wang Xian.

It wanted to devour his consciousness.

This caused Wang Xian’s expression to change drastically.

He sensed that he had entered a pitch-black world. This world was filled with deathly silent energy.

The entire world was incomparably vast and boundless.

This was completely different from everything in the outside world.

It was as though time had stopped inside.

Wang Xian’s consciousness was melted and fused by this space.

He wanted to completely destroy it and make it a part of this place.

Wang Xian’s heart was beating violently as he urged all the energy in his body to resist.

At the same time, his soul-stirring body emitted a luster.

“Roar Roar Roar!”

“Roar Roar Roar!”

Wang Xian roared with all his might.

However, very soon, he felt that his body was disappearing bit by bit as he fused with the surrounding energy!

This made Wang Xian a little scared. He mobilized all the energy in his body to resist.

However, no matter how hard he tried to resist, he couldn’t resist the melting of his body.

He couldn’t feel the pain in his body, but he could feel that his body was losing.

Along with it was his soul!

“No, I can’t be swallowed by this ball. Otherwise, all my efforts will go down the drain!”

Wang Xian’s expression was extremely ugly.

Once he was merged, he would die.

This operation would fail.

This caused him to suffer a huge loss.

Moreover, at this moment, his heart was palpitating. There was always a strong sense of danger.

This sense of danger caused him to be horrified from the bottom of his heart.

He felt that he was not truly dead when he was merged by this ball. Instead, he was merging with this ball.

Merging did not mean that he would die.

In that case, he might not be able to resurrect!

This was an instinct that came from the depths of his heart.

This instinct made him feel a little terrified!

If he was really merged and survived in another way, it would be equivalent to his complete annihilation.

It would be equivalent to the complete disappearance of the Dragon King!

“No, my consciousness can not disappear. Otherwise, I might really die.”

Wang Xian did not expect to encounter such a situation.

If he knew that there was such a risk, he would definitely not take it.

At the same time, he was deeply shocked by this ball.

The energy contained in this ball and the ability it displayed was too terrifying.

It would assimilate you directly instead of destroying you completely.

You were still alive, but it was equivalent to you being dead!

Wang Xian took a deep breath. The energy wrapped around his remaining body and he wanted to fly out.

Buzz Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz Buzz

However, Wang Xian soon realized that he couldn’t get out at all.

It was as if this space was endless!

This caused Wang Xian’s expression to change drastically again!

“Ding, the system has detected that the host is encountering a huge crisis. Please separate your soul and enter the system Dragon Palace to avoid complete death!”

“Ding, the system has detected that the host is encountering a huge crisis. Please separate your soul and enter the system Dragon Palace to avoid complete death!”

Just when Wang Xian was unable to escape or escape from this space and was being melted bit by bit, the system’s voice suddenly rang out.

The Divine Dragon system was the cheat that allowed Wang Xian to grow so quickly.

However, ever since Wang Xian became stronger and stronger, the system’s role became less and less useful.

This was because this system was created by the strongest person of the Divine Dragon Clan in the past. He was not as strong as the current Wang Xian.

Therefore, the system was now just a simple support.

Regardless, this system was created by the Divine Dragon Clan in the past. They perished together with the peak race of the insect clan.

It also had many unique features.

Another point was that the system was connected to the Dragon Palace.

Now, the system sensed Wang Xian’s danger and forcefully connected to the Dragon Palace.

When Wang Xian heard the system’s voice, he quickly separated his consciousness.

At this moment, he could sense the existence of the Dragon Palace.

He quickly separated his soul and used the power of the system to open the passage to the Dragon Palace.

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

Such a long-distance teleportation caused the entire dragon palace to shake.

The ancestral tree of the dragon palace shone with light, especially the branches of the soul-returning tree.

The soul-returning fruits slowly withered, fell, and disappeared!

A large number of soul-returning fruits died.

Soon after, the maternal fruit above the ancestral tree began to fall.

The fruits on top started to wither and dissipate.

In just a few seconds, three mother embryo fruits had withered.

At this moment, the connection between Wang Xian and the Dragon Palace was getting stronger.

An invisible passageway seemed to have opened up!

A wisp of Wang Xian’s soul passed through this passageway and entered the Dragon Palace.

Wang Xian’s soul entered the Dragon Palace.

He looked at the location of the passageway in horror.

He could see that at the end of the passageway, most of his body was in an unfamiliar world. He was being absorbed by this world.

That world seemed to be able to assimilate everything.

Just when Wang Xian thought that he had escaped this calamity, the passageway opened by the system slowly turned gray.

Wang Xian could sense that an energy was spreading towards the dragon palace through this passageway.

“What?”

Wang Xian was shocked when he saw this scene. A shocked expression appeared on his face.

What was this?

The energy in the sphere was spreading through the passageway opened by the system. Was it trying to assimilate the entire Dragon Palace?

Was it trying to assimilate everything?

His expression changed drastically. With a wave of his arm, a stream of energy entered the passageway.

This stream of energy was quickly assimilated!

When Wang Xian saw this scene, his expression changed drastically.

The energy in the sphere was about to invade.

It was like a universe that could devour everything and assimilate everything.

Wang Xian’s soul trembled slightly as he stared at it with an embarrassed expression.

“Huff! Huff!”

His breathing was rapid as he forced himself to calm down.

He waved his arm and mobilized the energy of the Dragon Palace to enter the passageway in an attempt to block the passageway.

However, when the energy entered the passageway, it was assimilated bit by bit.

“That’s not right. The speed at which this sphere assimilates individual elemental energy is much slower.”

At this moment, Wang Xian suddenly noticed a problem.

His gaze focused as he sensed that the body that was still in the sphere had exploded.

“Roar Roar Roar!”

Wang Xian’s body that was in the sphere was directly divided into ten divine dragons that were dripping with blood.

They were divided into individual elemental beings.

After the separation, Wang Xian immediately sensed that the speed of assimilation was reduced by dozens of times compared to before.

However, it was still being assimilated.
